name: Taxi Pick Up
description:
Taxi Pick Up is a nice Hyper-Casual game. Taxi Pick Up have 50 levels. You’re a driver and your duty is transferring passengers. But you should be careful about other vehicles that are moving at fast speed.

Can you handle driving like a professional taxi driver? Don’t let other drivers hit you!!

You can change your car type and color by passing the levels and collecting more dollars! So keep going to add more money!

All the assets of DD Taxi Pickup are designed with DoonDookStudio including graphic design and music.

Our Game Store for Game Source Codes: https://doondook.studio/buy-html5-games
